# Questions

## Part 1

```{r}
?midwest

glimpse(midwest)
```

### Question 1

```{r}
midwest |>
  group_by(state) |>
  summarize(counties = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(counties))
  
```

The highest number of counties can be found in IL with 102 counties. The lowest number of counties can be found in WI with 72 counties.
